definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.chinese: 是名詞子句當受詞，也是補語。

sentences.english: An intransitive phrasal verb is not followed by an object.
sentences.chinese: 不及物片語動詞沒有直接受詞跟隨著。

sentences.english: A preposition together with its object is termed " prepositional phrase".
sentences.chinese: 一個介詞與它其後的受詞一併被稱爲“介詞片語”。

sentences.english: The relative pronoun is often dropped if it is the subject.
sentences.chinese: 關係代名詞做受詞時常被省略。
